channel.title: “Feedback” Bubble - By XLXK [future bass dubstep trap]
channel.description:
I need some feedback, what needs to be toned down, removed, or added! All feedback is welcome and appreciated. Credit to @BenVacca for the piano at the beginning 🙏 I will no longer provide the project link as it’s almost complete! https://drive.google.com/file/d/1emqksHOb4rhI2lmTSN_WzWQKjbR6vYNM/view?usp=drivesdk
Edit- This is no longer needed but you are welcome to see what the drop looked like/ how it was made (was original post) [spoiler]I have tried to make a intro and part of a outro but nothing I try works well. I wanted like a chill piano Type intro but I don’t know what to put . Any ideas etc leave comment, 🙏thanks. https://app.auxy.co/projects/pVH3MKPHfJKV-qv_ERlnNw==[/spoiler]
